languages.text: "Они б не смогли это провернуть, если б нас здесь не было, а ситуацию решали те люди, в чьи обязанности это входит". {n}Абеляр морщится.{/n} "Худший порок младших офицеров — перекладывать проблемы на командование. Всегда это не выносил. Еще раз повторю — вы зря пошли на поводу у лейтенанта Вент, Лорд-капитан".

"They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Они б не смогли это провернуть, если б нас здесь не было, а ситуацию решали те люди, в чьи обязанности это входит". {n}Абеляр морщится.{/n} "Худший порок младших офицеров — перекладывать проблемы на командование. Всегда это не выносил. Еще раз повторю — вы зря пошли на поводу у лейтенанта Вент, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如果我们没来这里，如果这个问题已经由相关官员处理好的话，他们就没有机会表达这种不敬。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“身为下级军官，最失败的做法就是把问题推给上面的人，我从来都无法容忍这种行为。请允许我重复一遍——由于温特中尉心血来潮，我们跟着她来到了这个地方。这是个错误的决定，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们没来这里，如果这个问题已经由相关官员处理好的话，他们就没有机会表达这种不敬。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“身为下级军官，最失败的做法就是把问题推给上面的人，我从来都无法容忍这种行为。请允许我重复一遍——由于温特中尉心血来潮，我们跟着她来到了这个地方。这是个错误的决定，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No habrían podido expresar esa falta de respeto si no hubiéramos venido y si la situación hubiera sido resuelta por los oficiales responsables». {n}Abelard hace una mueca.{/n} «El peor fracaso de un oficial novato es elevar los problemas a sus superiores. Nunca he podido tolerarlo. Quiero repetir que ha sido un error venir aquí por un capricho de la teniente Vent, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «No habrían podido expresar esa falta de respeto si no hubiéramos venido y si la situación hubiera sido resuelta por los oficiales responsables». {n}Abelard hace una mueca.{/n} «El peor fracaso de un oficial novato es elevar los problemas a sus superiores. Nunca he podido tolerarlo. Quiero repetir que ha sido un error venir aquí por un capricho de la teniente Vent, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我らがここにおらず、関係者が対処していれば、彼らはそのような無礼な態度を示す機会はなかったでしょう」{n}アベラルドは苦笑する。{/n}「指揮系統に問題を持ち込むのは、下士官にとって最悪の失敗です。我はそれをそのままにしたことはございません。繰り返すようですが…ヴェント副官の気まぐれでここに来たのは間違いでした、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「我らがここにおらず、関係者が対処していれば、彼らはそのような無礼な態度を示す機会はなかったでしょう」{n}アベラルドは苦笑する。{/n}「指揮系統に問題を持ち込むのは、下士官にとって最悪の失敗です。我はそれをそのままにしたことはございません。繰り返すようですが…ヴェント副官の気まぐれでここに来たのは間違いでした、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sie hätten keine Gelegenheit, so respektlos zu sein, wenn wir nicht hier wären, und wenn die zuständigen Offiziere sich nicht um die Lage gekümmert hätten." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Es ist das schlimmste Versagen eines niederen Offiziers, Probleme die Befehlskette hinaufzureichen. Ich konnte das nie ertragen. Ich sage es erneut: Es war ein Fehler, auf Lieutenant Vents Wunsch herzukommen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hätten keine Gelegenheit, so respektlos zu sein, wenn wir nicht hier wären, und wenn die zuständigen Offiziere sich nicht um die Lage gekümmert hätten." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Es ist das schlimmste Versagen eines niederen Offiziers, Probleme die Befehlskette hinaufzureichen. Ich konnte das nie ertragen. Ich sage es erneut: Es war ein Fehler, auf Lieutenant Vents Wunsch herzukommen, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ça ne serait pas arrivé si nous avions laissé faire les officiers compétents au lieu d'intervenir personnellement. » {n}Abélard esquisse une grimace.{/n} « Solliciter la hiérarchie à tout bout de champ est le plus grave manquement dont un sous-officier puisse se rendre coupable. Jamais je ne cautionnerai une telle démarche. Je l'ai dit et je le répète : c'était une erreur de céder au caprice de la lieutenante Vent en acceptant de venir ici. »
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne serait pas arrivé si nous avions laissé faire les officiers compétents au lieu d'intervenir personnellement. » {n}Abélard esquisse une grimace.{/n} « Solliciter la hiérarchie à tout bout de champ est le plus grave manquement dont un sous-officier puisse se rendre coupable. Jamais je ne cautionnerai une telle démarche. Je l'ai dit et je le répète : c'était une erreur de céder au caprice de la lieutenante Vent en acceptant de venir ici. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Burada olmasaydık, meseleyi ilgili subaylar çözseydi bu saygısızlığı yapamayacaklardı." {n}Abelard yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Sorunları komuta zinciri dâhilinde çözememek, bir kıdemsiz subayın en büyük hatasıdır. Tekrar söyleyeceğim Lord Kaptan: Teğmen Vent'in sözüyle buraya gelmek yanlıştı."
languages.original_text: "They would not have the chance to express such disrespect if we were not here, and if the situation had been dealt with by the relevant officers." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n} "It is a junior officer's worst failing, to pass problems up the chain of command. I have never been able to abide it. I shall say it again — it was a mistake to come here on Lieutenant Vent's whim, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Burada olmasaydık, meseleyi ilgili subaylar çözseydi bu saygısızlığı yapamayacaklardı." {n}Abelard yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Sorunları komuta zinciri dahilinde çözememek, bir kıdemsiz subayın en büyük hatasıdır. Tekrar söyleyeceğim Lord Kaptan: Teğmen Vent'in sözüyle buraya gelmek yanlıştı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
